name: Servicemesh - Consul Agent (Server) Memory Usage 90% Detector
programText:
from signalfx.detectors.countdown import countdown
A = data('memory.total', filter=filter('plugin', 'consul')).sum(by=['host']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('gauge.consul.runtime.sys_bytes', filter=filter('plugin', 'consul') and filter('consul_mode', 'server')).sum(by=['host']).publish(label='B', enable=False)
AB = alerts(detector_name='Memory Usage 90% Detector').publish(label='AB')
C = ((1-(A-B)/A)*100).publish(label='C')
countdown.hours_left_stream_incr_detector(stream=C, maximum_capacity=90, lower_threshold=24, fire_lasting=lasting('15m', 1), clear_threshold=36, clear_lasting=lasting('15m', 1), use_double_ewma=False).publish('Consul Agent Memory Usage 90% Rule')

rules.description: The signal Percent used (assumed to be increasing) is projected to increase to 90 in 24 hour(s).
rules.parameterizedSubject: {{ruleSeverity}} Alert: Consul Agent memory usage reaching 90%
